nuwara eliya para dige thibuna sutti sutti diya ali laga nathara wemin foto ekathu kala api ramboda alla pena manaye para ayinata wenna nathara wuni, ethana thibuna bammaka idagena chatak damagena tikak giman hara nawatha pitath wuni.meda para nathara wune nuwara eliya tawume wahana pak ekeya.welawa hawasa 3 pasuwiya.dan aththe nawathanata pot ekak sewimaya nawatha gugal rajayage pihita pathu apita ru.1500/= kata pot ekak palamu sewillen dis wuni.kol kara ena widiha aha gaththa api kima rums soya giyemu.pot eka balu matath chuti puthatath pot eka set natha.api nawathath pare ayinaka karaya nawatha gugal gen sahaya pathuweya.niyama pot ekak set wuni enam gegari wawa penena manaye kadu gatiththaka pihita thibu sakura gest hawus ekaya.ganada sadaranaya unu wathurada samaga ru.3500\= kiyu kamaraya ru.3000\=kin labadimata risipshan eke mahatha kamathi uni.
